ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Xurtin, I was in all three BETAs for EQOA. I think if you are comming from the PC version of EQ, even if its been a while since you last played, that you
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Xurtin,

I was in all three BETAs for EQOA. I think if you are comming from the PC
version of EQ, even if its been a while since you last played, that you will
probably be a little disappointed. The graphics are ok, but the game play
mechanics were just not my cup of tea.

Then again, I'm sure they've made huge strides since I last played the PS2
BETA, so its probably worth it to try it out for yourself and make your own
conclusions.

I know its not much info, but its really all I have. I hope this helped you
in some way. :-)

-Oskar
